tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE kyc_regulations (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(200),
    identification_number VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE KYC_Customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    kyc_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Transaction_Logs (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE KYC_Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    government_id VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Transaction_History (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    currency VARCHAR(10),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES KYC_Users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Suspicious_Activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    report_reason VARCHAR(255),
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transaction_History(transaction_id)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    address TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    source_wallet TEXT NOT NULL,
    destination_wallet TEXT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE identities (
    identity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    id_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    id_number TEXT NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    alert_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customer_information (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  identification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  identification_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE flag_activity (
  flag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
  flag_reason VARCHAR(200),
  flagged_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  flag_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE KYC_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  update_field VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  previous_value VARCHAR(200),
  new_value VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL
);
